text: SMALL WORLD! Mike Fitzpatrick was sitting in a truck in Vietnam last week waiting to be moved to another camp when other soldiers happened by to ask directions. Mike thinking that he recognized a familiar face said "Shouldn't I know you" turned out to be James Murphy. Although this coincidental meeting was limited to a few minutes, it must have been a most refreshing occasion to both, to unexpectedly see someone from your own home town in such a far away land.
